thread.title: Yu Yureka Plus gets a price drop ahead of Amazon India Flash sale
thread.title_full: Yu Yureka Plus gets a price drop ahead of Amazon India Flash sale | The Financial Express

author: financialexpress.com
title: Yu Yureka Plus gets a price drop ahead of Amazon India Flash sale
text:
The Yureka Plus is now available at Rs 8,999 making it the most affordable smartphone with a Full HD display. Yu Televentures tweeted that its dropping the price of Yureka Plus by Rs 1000. The registrations will close at midnight of August 4th and the sale is scheduled for August 6th at 12PM exclusively on Amazon India.
The Yu Yureka Plus features a 5.5-inch full HD display with a pixel denisty of 401ppi. The display is protected by a Corning Gorilla Glass 3. The smartphone runs CyanogenMod OS 12 based on Android 5.0.2 Lollipop. The Yu Yureka Plus is powered by a 1.5GHz octa-core Qualcomm Snapdragon 615 SoC paired with Adreno 405 GPU.
The device comes with 2GB RAM and 16GB internal memory further expandable to 32GB via microSD card. The Yu Yureka Plus features a 13MP primary camera and 5MP secondary camera. Yu Yureka Plus has a 2500mAh battery and comes in White and gray colour variants.
 04, 2015 4:28 pm
